tool_description: Selects and configures appropriate digital instruments and synthesizers for different musical parts and styles.

instrument_type.description: Type: piano, guitar, bass, strings, brass, woodwinds, synthesizer, drums

musical_style.description: Musical style: classical, rock, pop, jazz, electronic, ambient

sound_character.description: Sound character: natural, vintage, modern, ambient, aggressive

error_messages: Unknown instrument type: Choose from piano, guitar, bass, strings, brass, woodwinds, synthesizer, drums
Unsupported musical style: Choose from classical, rock, pop, jazz, electronic, ambient
Invalid sound character: Choose from natural, vintage, modern, ambient, aggressive
usage: Specify instrument type and musical style, optionally set sound character and effects. Returns instrument configuration with preset details.
